posts.postText:
I've got another asshole here... Because guards like Mike Hawk, and another named Soccer7 (however, I do not have evidence to report him), couldn't help themselves from killing disguised prisoners, I'm back to report another offender. Mike Hawk's only reply to me telling him I will report him, is him not believing me. He didn't deny freekill in any way or form.

Offender name?: Mike Hawk - Attorney at Law
Which Server?: 
Offender's Steam ID?: STEAM_0:1:26693292
What the Offender did?: Freekilled a disguised prisoner, not the first time, and just being a general douche I think.
Admins on?: Nope.
Proof?:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VN3JsqZxFew
And yes, I am aware that I sound pretty gay in this video... But that escapes the point. You can clearly see I was disguised when my body hits the floor, and you can also hear his only argument, that he doesn't actually believe that I was recording the round. He clearly doesn't care about what he did.

Isn't that HumbleBrick? I thought he doesn't play anymore.

EDIT: And that DOES show CLEAR evidence of freekilling.
I have more I can upload as well... If you want it. But this seems sufficient.

Ban request accepted, banned, told by Dum to ban him for 20k mins, so be it.

  Locked
